text: greetings my name is Matt Wood and I'm
here at the AWS headquarters in Seattle
to give you an update on load balancing
today we're adding a new type of
application load balancer to AWS which
allows you to Define routing rules based
on the content of the request this lets
you efficiently Route traffic to
specific services within your
application instead of just groups of
infastructure instances so for example
the application low balancer will make
sure that traffic gets routed to your
order service wherever it is running
including across Dynamic ports for
container-based applications it's a
higher order routing abstraction which
gets the right traffic to the right
application component the service also
supports enhanced metrics and health
checks to monitor traffic to each
application service behind the low
balancer this feature will be especially
helpful to customers running containers
or who are migrating monolithic
applications to smaller decoupled
Services the new application low
balancer is available today that's it
thanks a lot
